mapper.select: SELECT ca.no AS no, t.no AS tmpl_no, t.name AS name, t.thumbnail_path AS thumbnail_path, t.price AS price, t.discount_rate AS discount_rate, t.type AS type, c.name AS category_name, l.name AS lawyer_name FROM cart ca JOIN template t ON ca.tmpl_no = t.no LEFT JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.no LEFT JOIN lawyer l ON t.user_no = l.no WHERE ca.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY ca.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tmpl_orders_history (tmpl_no, order_no, price) VALUES (#{tmplNo}, #{orderNo}, #{price})
